text: Ma ti kuraharusamga, jasala'i ki timile allahako sajhedara thahara'umchau, kasari dara manna sakchu, jaba ki timila'i yasa kurosamga bhaya chaina ki allahasamga aruko sajhedari thahara'umchau jasako lagi usale kunai pramana utareko chaina? Aba du'itai samuhamadhye kunacamhi suraksako hakadara cha, yadi timima jnana cha bhane
